mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_USER(ID, PW, GENDER, NICK, REGION, HOBBY, PHONE, TUTORIAL_ST, PROFILE_IMG, PROFILE_IMG, USER_ROLE, JOINED_AT) VALUES(#{id}, #{pw}, #{gender}, #{nick}, #{region}, #{hobby}, #{phone}, #{tutorialSt}, #{profileImg}, #{userRole} ,#{joinedAt})

INSERT INTO tbl_schedule (sche_title, sche_content, sche_st_date, sche_end_date, group_no) VALUES (#{scheTitle}, #{scheContent}, #{scheStDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{scheEndDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{groupNo})
mapper.select: SELECT SCHE_NO AS scheNo, SCHE_TITLE AS scheTitle, SCHE_ST_DATE AS scheStDate, SCHE_END_DATE AS scheEndDate, SCHE_CONTENT AS scheContent, GROUP_NO AS groupNo FROM TBL_SCHEDULE WHERE GROUP_NO = #{groupNo}

SELECT GROUP_LIKES, GROUP_NAME, HOBBY_NAME, HOBBY_NO, GROUP_INFO, GROUP_NO FROM (SELECT A.GROUP_LIKES, A.GROUP_NAME, B.HOBBY_NAME, A.GROUP_INFO, A.GROUP_NO, B.HOBBY_NO FROM TBL_GROUP A INNER JOIN TBL_HOBBY B ON A.HOBBY_NO = B.HOBBY_NO ORDER BY GROUP_LIKES DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <=4

SELECT GROUP_LIKES, GROUP_NAME , HOBBY_NAME, GROUP_INFO, GROUP_NO, HOBBY_NO FROM ( SELECT A.GROUP_LIKES, A.GROUP_NAME, B.HOBBY_NAME, A.GROUP_INFO , A.GROUP_NO, B.HOBBY_NO FROM TBL_GROUP A INNER JOIN TBL_HOBBY B ON A.HOBBY_NO = B.HOBBY_NO ORDER BY GROUP_LIKES DESC) WHERE HOBBY_NAME = #{hobbyName} AND ROWNUM <= 4
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_FILE(COMM_NO, FILE_NAME, FILE_ORI_NAME, FILE_THUMB, FILE_S3_PATH, FILE_SIZE, EXT) VALUES(#{commNo} , #{fileName}, #{fileOriName}, #{fileThumb}, #{fileS3Path}, #{fileSize}, #{ext})

INSERT INTO tbl_group (group_name,group_info,hobby_no) VALUES (#{groupName},#{groupInfo},#{hobbyNo})
SELECT tbl_group_SEQ.CURRVAL AS groupNo FROM DUAL

insert into tbl_community (group_no,comm_title,comm_content,id) values(#{groupNo},'title',#{commContent},#{id})
SELECT tbl_community_SEQ.CURRVAL AS comm_no FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT GROUP_NAME AS groupName , GROUP_NO AS groupNo FROM TBL_GROUP WHERE GROUP_NAME LIKE '%' || #{groupName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
SELECT * FROM TBL_FILE WHERE REGEXP_LIKE(FILE_NAME, #{fileName}) AND ROWNUM <= 1
select comm_No, id , comm_content AS commContent, comm_likes AS likes from tbl_community where group_no=#{groupNo} order by comm_no
SELECT tbl_community.comm_no, tbl_comment.comment_content, tbl_comment.id FROM tbl_community INNER JOIN tbl_comment ON tbl_community.comm_no = tbl_comment.comm_no order by comment_no
SELECT id, nick, phone, region, hobby, PROFILE_IMG FROM TBL_USER WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT A.ID, A.GROUP_NO, B.GROUP_NAME FROM TBL_JOINING A, TBL_GROUP B WHERE A.GROUP_NO=B.GROUP_NO AND A.ID=#{id} AND A.APPROVE_JOIN = 1

select A.id AS id, A.group_no AS groupNo, A.approve_join AS approveJoin, B.gender AS gender, B.hobby AS hobby, B.region AS region, B.profile_img AS profileImg from tbl_joining A, tbl_user B where a.id = b.id and group_no = #{groupNo, jdbcType=INTEGER} and approve_join = 0
SELECT nick, phone, level_no as levelNo FROM TBL_JOINING A INNER JOIN TBL_GROUP B ON A.GROUP_NO = B.GROUP_NO INNER JOIN tbl_user C ON A.id = C.id WHERE B.group_no = #{groupNo}
SELECT COMM_NO FROM (SELECT COMM_NO FROM TBL_COMMUNITY ORDER BY COMM_NO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1
